meanings.definition: In a manner relating to the back and front of an organism.
meanings.sent1: The fish swims dorsiventrally in the water, moving smoothly from its back to its front.
meanings.sent2: She observed the bird flying dorsiventrally, with its back and front clearly visible.
meanings.sent3: The cat stretched dorsiventrally, trying to touch its back and front paws at the same time.
meanings.sent4: The dancer moved dorsiventrally across the stage, gracefully transitioning from one end to the other.
meanings.sent5: The car drove dorsiventrally along the road, smoothly navigating from the back to the front of the town.

meanings.definition: Oriented with the back and front as reference points.
meanings.sent1: The dorsiventrally positioned tree had its back facing the house and its front facing the garden.
meanings.sent2: The lizard had a dorsiventrally oriented body, with its back scales contrasting with its front coloration.
meanings.sent3: The bookshelf was placed dorsiventrally in the room, creating a unique visual effect.
meanings.sent4: The building had a dorsiventrally designed entrance, with the back door leading to the alley and the front door facing the street.
meanings.sent5: The map displayed the city in a dorsiventrally accurate way, showing the back and front landmarks clearly.
